cookie.name: cookie
cookie.use: You eat a cookie! The chocolate melts in your mouth, and you become so hyper that you start an exercise show and earn 500 ADB coins!

cheese.name: aged_cheese
cheese.use: Wow! You ate cheese as a dare, and earned 100 ADB credits!

diamond.name: diamond
diamond.use: You take this to the jewler and trade it for a 100 lootboxes!

phone.name: phone
phone.use: You open your phone and get gifted nitro when you install the discord app! You convert it into 100 admin badges.

computer.name: computer
computer.use: You open your computer and enter an online lottery and win 500 ADB coins! However, the ticket costs you 10x phones.

admin.name: admin_badge
admin.use: You feel like you own everything. You type aga!daily into your computer and earn 100 credits for a second daily! The best part: your daily time still stays the same.

charger.name: charger
charger.desc: A charger to charge random things!
charger.use: You use your charger and get a fully charged phone!
